ZERGLING comes back from the vortex in his room. He shakes his head 
thinking of the immaige he saw. it was of The whole world a baren 
wastle land every bot and animaial died becuase the bots destroyed 
everthing. He was scared. He had to do something. He didn't know
what. 
he figured the best way to do something is to help out around the
base 
and wait for Crow Lord to get back form the vortex.
 He runs to the command center looking for Zardus. "WHat do you wish 
me to do?"
